info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:23PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Powell County through 400 PM MDT... At 323 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Helena, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elliston. This includes Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 23 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for west central Montana.
